name: Cute Godzilla
description:
Help Baby Godzilla defeat its first monster threating Japan!

This game was made for the 2016 Global Game jam. The game was slightly modified for the itch.io release.

Keyboard controls:

Move left and right: A, D

Move up: W

Shoot fireball: Space

The Team:
